The plot below shows the energy level by key. Most of Taylor Swift's songs are above 0.50, and most of Bach's are below. The most common keys for Bach are G major, E major, B minor, and D major, while the most common keys for Taylor Swift are C major, D major, G major, D major, and F major. The most energetic albums for Taylor Swift are ***1989***, ***Speak Now***, and ***Fearless***. The least energetic albums are ***folklore*** and ***evermore***. For Bach, the most energetic albums are ***Innovations: Bach***, and ***J. S. Bach: Cantatas***. The least energetic album is ***Bach on Porthan Organ***. 


```{r plots_energy, echo = FALSE, out.width = "90%", fig.width = 9, fig.height = 9}
library(patchwork)
library(tidyverse)
bach_energy<- readRDS("data/bach_energy_plot.rds")
ts_energy<- readRDS("data/ts_energy_plot.rds")
ts_energy + bach_energy
```
